page.title: 09A schoolday for Miren.
page.content: I usually wake up at 7.00am in the morning,I then read for about half an hour before getting up.After dressing I go down to have my breakfast of cereal and orange.The school bus picks me up at 8.10 and we arrive at the school at 8.45 our school is in{PONTYBRENIN}which is five miles from{SWANSEA.} The first thing we do every morning is go to the service in the hall,then we go to our classrooms to do Welsh,English and mathematics before our first break of the day which is at 10.30.After break we do more lessons until lunchtime at 12.30,Itake sandwiches for dinner and Ieat them in the hall. Our afternoon lessons begin at 1.00pm,we have one more break before going home at 3.20.When I arrive home Iwatch "Clwb S4C" on the T.V.
